root.title: Mainz 174a-e (T II K, T II D 52) 408
root.names: Mainz 174a-e (T II K, T II D 52).
root.place: Found during the archeological excavations of the Second German Turfan expedition (Zweite Preußische Turfanexpedition 410) in East Turkestan.
root.store: It is stored in the Berlin-Brandenburg Academy of Sciences (Berlin-Brandenburgischen Akademie der Wissenschaften).
root.general: 5 small fragments are glazed together. Probably these fragments belong to U 175 (Wilkens, №588). It is considered its average part.
root.description: Manuscript: Old Turkic, black and red colors. Paper: from thin to thick, color from light yellow to chestnut, in the middle of fragment “a” and in the right part of fragment “b” aqueous stains. Quantity of lines: a: 2 lines in each in A and B; b: 7 lines in A and 5 lines in B; c: 2 lines in each in A and B; d: 4 lines in each in A and B; e: 3 lines in each in A and B. Designations: B: b: between 4-5 lines: T II K (pencil); d: between 3-4 lines: T II D 52 (pencil); A: on the right bottom corner the sticker Mainz 174; on the bottom T II D.52-K. Characteristics: colon marks are outlined in red; lines 1, 2, 4-6 in A and lines 1-3 in B are red.
root.size: Distance between lines: a (in the middle): 0.8 cm; b (at the left): 0.6 cm (in A between lines 1-3: 0.5 cm; in B between lines 4 and 5: 0.9 cm); d (on the right): 1.1 cm; c (top) and е (bottom): are not defined. a: 2.4 cm (height) x 2.7 cm (width); b: 3.5 cm (height) x 1.5 cm (width); c: 1.2 cm (height) x 1.6 cm (width); d: 3.8 cm (height) x 1.6 cm (width); е: 1.0 cm (height) x 1.9 cm (width).
root.investigation: Sertkaya 424 conducted researches.
root.details: Depositum der BERLIN-BRANDENBURGISCHEN AKADEMIE DER WISSENSCHAFTEN in der STAATSBIBLIOTHEK ZU BERLIN - Preussischer Kulturbesitz. Orientabteilung.

Екінші Прусс Тұрпан экспедициясы. Бұл экспедицияда жүргізілген қазбаларда табылған қолжазбаларды TII деп белгілеген. Экспедицияны Dr. A. v. Le Coq бастап барған. Th. Bartus қатысқан. Үрімшіден бастап Тұрпан оазисіне дейін (Хошо және соны қоршап жатқан аймақ, Жар-Қото, 1904 жыл, қарашадан бастап 1905 жылдың тамызына дейін; Хами 1905 жылдың тамызы; Тұрпан). Барлығы 103 түйіншек әкетілген. Олардың ішінде дені сурет (Bäzäklik), мәтіндер көп емес.
TII - Zweite Preußische Turfanexpedition
Expedition. Leiter: Dr. A. v. Le Coq; Teilnehmer: Th. Bartus. Route: Urumči -Turfanoase (Qočo und umliegende Stätten, Yar-Khoto Nov.1904-Aug.1905; Hami Aug. 1905; Turfan) - nördl. Seidenstraße-Kašghar (Okt. 1905; dort Vereinigung im Dez. mit 3. Expedition). 103 Kisten, hauptsächlich Gemälde (Bäzäklik), weniger Texte (christl. Texte in syr., sogd., mp., uig.; buddh. Texte).
